item.name: BUFFER_EMPTY
item.description: Deserialization buffer was empty when trying to read data

item.name: FORMAT_ERROR
item.description: Deserialization data had incorrect values (unexpected data types)

item.name: SIZE_MISMATCH
item.description: Data was left in in the buffer, but not enough to deserialize

item.name: WARNING_LO
item.description: A less serious but recoverable event

item.name: HDMI
item.description: Display video stream over on-board HDMI port

item.name: UDP
item.description: Stream video over UDP to HOSTNAME:PORT

item.name: BOTH
item.description: Stream to both UDP and HDMI simultaneously

command.description: Clear command tracking info to recover from components not returning status

arg.name: fileName
arg.description: The name of the sequence file

arg.name: block
arg.description: Return command status when complete or not

arg.name: fileName
arg.description: The name of the sequence file

command.description: Perform one step in a command sequence. Valid only if CmdSequencer is in MANUAL run mode.
Set the run mode to AUTO.
Set the run mode to MANUAL.
Wait for sequences that are running to finish. Allow user to run multiple seq files in SEQ_NO_BLOCK mode then wait for them to finish before allowing more seq run request.
Remove a directory, which must be empty
Perform a Linux shell command and write the output to a log file.

arg.name: logFileName
arg.description: The name of the log file

command.description: Append 1 file's contents to the end of another.

arg.name: source
arg.description: The name of the file to take content from

arg.name: target
arg.description: The name of the file to append to

command.description: Set filter for reporting events. Events are not stored in component.
Dump the filter states via events
Command to save parameter image to file. Uses file name passed to constructor
Capture a single image and save it to a file
Stop active image capture from the camera
Exposure time, 0 for hardware minimum parameter set
Exposure time, 0 for hardware minimum parameter save
Auto white balance red gain, dB parameter set
Auto white balance red gain, dB parameter save
Auto white balance blue gain, dB parameter set
Auto white balance blue gain, dB parameter save
Saturation, 1 for color, 0 for bw parameter set
Saturation, 1 for color, 0 for bw parameter save
Write some text on a certain line

event.name: RateGroupStarted
event.description: Informational event that rate group has started

event.name: RateGroupCycleSlip
event.description: Warning event that rate group has had a cycle slip
event.format_string: Rate group cycle slipped on cycle %u

arg.name: cycle
arg.description: The cycle where the cycle occurred

arg.name: slot
arg.description: The dispatch slot it was placed in

event.name: OpCodeDispatched
event.description: Op code dispatched event

event.name: OpCodeCompleted
event.description: Op code completed event

event.name: OpCodeError
event.description: Op code completed with error event

event.name: MalformedCommand
event.description: Received a malformed command packet

event.name: InvalidCommand
event.description: Received an invalid opcode

event.name: TooManyCommands
event.description: Exceeded the number of commands that can be simultaneously executed

arg.name: Opcode
arg.description: The opcode that overflowed the list

event.name: NoOpReceived
event.description: The command dispatcher has successfully received a NO-OP command

event.name: NoOpStringReceived
event.description: The command dispatcher has successfully received a NO-OP command from GUI with a string

arg.name: message
arg.description: The NO-OP string that is generated

event.name: TestCmd1Args
event.description: This log event message returns the TEST_CMD_1 arguments.

event.name: OpCodeReregistered
event.description: Op code reregistered event
event.format_string: Opcode 0x%x is already registered to port %d

event.name: CS_SequenceLoaded
event.description: Sequence file was successfully loaded.

arg.name: fileName
arg.description: The name of the sequence file

event.name: CS_SequenceCanceled
event.description: A command sequence was successfully canceled.

arg.name: fileName
arg.description: The name of the sequence file

event.name: CS_FileReadError
event.description: The Sequence File Loader could not read the sequence file.

arg.name: fileName
arg.description: The name of the sequence file

event.name: CS_FileInvalid
event.description: The sequence file format was invalid.

arg.name: fileName
arg.description: The name of the sequence file

event.name: CS_RecordInvalid
event.description: The format of a command record was invalid.

arg.name: fileName
arg.description: The name of the sequence file

event.name: CS_FileSizeError
event.description: The sequence file was too large.

arg.name: fileName
arg.description: The name of the sequence file

event.name: CS_FileNotFound
event.description: The sequence file was not found

event.name: CS_FileCrcFailure
event.description: The sequence file validation failed
event.format_string: Sequence file %s had invalid CRC. Stored 0x%x, Computed 0x%x.

arg.name: storedCRC
arg.description: The CRC stored in the file

arg.name: computedCRC
arg.description: The CRC computed over the file

event.name: CS_CommandComplete
event.description: The Command Sequencer issued a command and received a success status in return.

arg.name: fileName
arg.description: The name of the sequence file

arg.name: recordNumber
arg.description: The record number of the command

event.name: CS_SequenceComplete
event.description: A command sequence successfully completed.

arg.name: fileName
arg.description: The name of the sequence file

event.name: CS_CommandError
event.description: The Command Sequencer issued a command and received an error status in return.
event.format_string: Sequence file %s: Command %u (opcode %u) completed with error %u

arg.name: fileName
arg.description: The name of the sequence file

event.name: CS_InvalidMode
event.description: The Command Sequencer received a command that was invalid for its current mode.

event.name: CS_RecordMismatch
event.description: Number of records in header doesn't match number in file
event.format_string: Sequence file %s header records mismatch: %u in header, found %u extra bytes.

arg.name: fileName
arg.description: The name of the sequence file

arg.name: header_records
arg.description: The number of records in the header

arg.name: extra_bytes
arg.description: The number of bytes beyond last record

event.name: CS_TimeBaseMismatch
event.description: The running time base doesn't match the time base in the sequence files
event.format_string: Sequence file %s: Current time base doesn't match sequence time: base: %u seq: %u

arg.name: fileName
arg.description: The name of the sequence file

event.name: CS_TimeContextMismatch
event.description: The running time base doesn't match the time base in the sequence files
event.format_string: Sequence file %s: Current time context doesn't match sequence context: base: %u seq: %u

arg.name: fileName
arg.description: The name of the sequence file

event.name: CS_PortSequenceStarted
event.description: A local port request to run a sequence was started

event.name: CS_UnexpectedCompletion
event.description: A command status came back when no sequence was running
event.format_string: Command complete status received while no sequences active. Opcode: %u

event.name: CS_ModeSwitched
event.description: Switched step mode

event.name: CS_NoSequenceActive
event.description: A sequence related command came with no active sequence

event.name: CS_SequenceValid
event.description: A sequence passed validation

event.name: CS_SequenceTimeout
event.description: A sequence passed validation

event.name: CS_CmdStepped
event.description: A command in a sequence was stepped through

event.name: CS_CmdStarted
event.description: A manual sequence was started

event.name: CS_JoinWaiting
event.description: Wait for the current running sequence file complete
event.format_string: Start waiting for sequence file %s: Command %u (opcode %u) to complete

event.name: CS_JoinWaitingNotComplete
event.description: Cannot run new sequence when current sequence file is still running.
event.format_string: Still waiting for sequence file to complete

event.name: DirectoryCreateError
event.description: An error occurred while attempting to create a directory
event.format_string: Could not create directory %s, returned status %u

event.name: DirectoryRemoveError
event.description: An error occurred while attempting to remove a directory
event.format_string: Could not remove directory %s, returned status %u

event.name: FileMoveError
event.description: An error occurred while attempting to move a file
event.format_string: Could not move file %s to file %s, returned status %u

arg.name: sourceFileName
arg.description: The name of the source file

arg.name: destFileName
arg.description: The name of the destination file

event.name: FileRemoveError
event.description: An error occurred while attempting to remove a file
event.format_string: Could not remove file %s, returned status %u

event.name: ShellCommandFailed
event.description: The File System component executed a shell command that returned status non-zero

event.name: AppendFileFailed
event.description: The File System component returned status non-zero when trying to append 2 files together

arg.name: source
arg.description: The name of the file being read from

arg.name: target
arg.description: The name of the file to append to

event.name: AppendFileSucceeded
event.description: The File System component appended 2 files without error

arg.name: source
arg.description: The name of the file being read from

arg.name: target
arg.description: The name of the file to append to

event.name: ShellCommandSucceeded
event.description: The File System component executed a shell command that returned status zero

event.name: CreateDirectorySucceeded
event.description: The File System component created a new directory without error

event.name: RemoveDirectorySucceeded
event.description: The File System component deleted and existing directory without error

event.name: MoveFileSucceeded
event.description: The File System component moved a file to a new location without error

arg.name: sourceFileName
arg.description: The name of the source file

arg.name: destFileName
arg.description: The name of the destination file

event.name: RemoveFileSucceeded
event.description: The File System component deleted an existing file without error

event.name: AppendFileStarted
event.description: The File System component appended 2 files without error
event.format_string: Appending file %s to the end of %s...

arg.name: source
arg.description: The name of the file being read from

arg.name: target
arg.description: The name of the file to append to

event.name: ShellCommandStarted
event.description: The File System component began executing a shell command

event.name: CreateDirectoryStarted
event.description: The File System component began creating a new directory

event.name: RemoveDirectoryStarted
event.description: The File System component began deleting a directory

event.name: MoveFileStarted
event.description: The File System component began moving a file to a new location

arg.name: sourceFileName
arg.description: The name of the source file

arg.name: destFileName
arg.description: The name of the destination file

event.name: RemoveFileStarted
event.description: The File System component began deleting an existing file

event.name: SEVERITY_FILTER_STATE
event.description: Dump severity filter state

event.name: ID_FILTER_ENABLED
event.description: Indicate ID is filtered

event.name: ID_FILTER_LIST_FULL
event.description: Attempted to add ID to full ID filter ID
event.format_string: ID filter list is full. Cannot filter %u .

event.name: ID_FILTER_REMOVED
event.description: Removed an ID from the filter

event.name: ID_FILTER_NOT_FOUND
event.description: ID not in filter

event.name: PrmIdNotFound
event.description: Parameter ID not found in database.

event.name: PrmIdUpdated
event.description: Parameter ID updated in database

event.name: PrmDbFull
event.description: Parameter database is full
event.format_string: Parameter DB full when adding ID 0x%x

event.name: PrmIdAdded
event.description: Parameter ID added to database

event.name: PrmFileWriteError
event.description: Failed to write parameter file
event.format_string: Parameter write failed in stage %s with record %d and error %d

arg.name: record
arg.description: The record that had the failure

event.name: PrmFileSaveComplete
event.description: Save of parameter file completed
event.format_string: Parameter file save completed. Wrote %u records.

event.name: PrmFileReadError
event.description: Failed to read parameter file
event.format_string: Parameter file read failed in stage %s with record %d and error %d

arg.name: record
arg.description: The record that had the failure

event.name: PrmFileLoadComplete
event.description: Load of parameter file completed
event.format_string: Parameter file load completed. Read %u records.

event.name: CameraInvalidGet
event.format_string: Attempting to get frame buffer with ID not in use %u

event.name: CameraInvalidIncref
event.format_string: Attempting to incref on buffer with ID not in use %u

event.name: CameraInvalidDecref
event.format_string: Attempting to decref on buffer with ID not in use %u

event.name: InvalidLineNumber
event.format_string: Attempting to write on line index %u when we only have %u lines

channel.name: CS_LoadCommands
channel.description: The number of Load commands executed

channel.name: CS_CancelCommands
channel.description: The number of Cancel commands executed

channel.name: CS_Errors
channel.description: The number of errors that have occurred

channel.name: CS_CommandsExecuted
channel.description: The number of commands executed across all sequences.

channel.name: CommandsExecuted
channel.description: The total number of commands successfully executed

channel.name: FramesTotal
channel.description: Total number of frames sent to the video streamer

channel.name: PacketsSent
channel.description: Number of UDP packets sent to server

channel.name: FramesTotal
channel.description: Total number of frames sent to the video streamer

channel.name: PacketsSent
channel.description: Number of UDP packets sent to server
